content: Document all changes made today during async database migration debugging
Analyze the root cause of today's 503 errors and MissingGreenlet exceptions
Create a comprehensive debugging checklist for future async database issues
Document the infrastructure configuration issues discovered today
Resolve the port 8000 conflict between development and production services
Start production services with proper port configuration
Test all endpoints to verify functionality after infrastructure fixes
Create a guide to prevent similar async database issues in the future
